# Cloud Wings (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 49

*As you touch the subject, mist forms crude wings that cling to his back.*

This spell increases the subjectâ€™s fly speed by 30 feet. It has no effect on other modes of movement, nor does it allow the subject to fly if it cannot already do so.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level per Savage Species.

*House Rule: Cloud wings* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
